headline: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) Faces Shareholder Activism Proposal As Stock Dips 12% Over Last Week
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) has been at the center of shareholder activism recently, as investor John Chevedden submitted a proposal to alter the company's charter to simplify voting processes. This comes as the market overall faced significant turmoil, with the Dow dropping over 2,200 points and the Nasdaq entering bear market territory amid escalating global trade tensions and tariffs announced by the U.S. administration. The broader market's declining trend contributed to NRG's own 12% decline...
